Articles.Content:
I am in need of a large amount of crafts in order to create a startup series for my youtube channel, NMR Gaming (email is [email protected]). Rovers, station modules and planes/ssto's are the main type of thing I will be looking for but I will be accepting any other type of craft as well ^-^ Any and all support will be greatly appreciated and be sure to leave your name and description of each craft as well as a craft file. If you would like to help out let me know by commenting ^-^ Again thanks for the support, It's greatly appreciated

Edited January 7, 2016 by BrandenPE
If you haven't seen it, kerbalx.com has a huge selection of craft. You would be welcome to use any of my creations that have been uploaded there or in the forums here.
